mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBERS_NO , A.MEMBERS_ID , A.MEMBERS_PWD , A.MEMBERS_TEL , A.MEMBERS_REG_DATE , A.MEMBERS_ENTIRE , B.MEMBERS_NO REF_MEMBERS_NO , B.AUTH_NUM REF_AUTH_NUM , C.AUTH_NUM REF_AUTH_NUM , C.AUTH_NAME , C.AUTH_KO FROM MEMBERS A LEFT JOIN AUTH_ROLE B ON (A.MEMBERS_NO = B.MEMBERS_NO) LEFT JOIN AUTH C ON (B.AUTH_NUM = C.AUTH_NUM) WHERE A.MEMBERS_ENTIRE = 'N' AND A.MEMBERS_ID = #{ memberId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS ( Members_No , Members_Name , Members_ID , Members_PWD , Members_Tel , Members_Reg_Date , Members_Entire ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBERS_NO.nextval , #{ membersName } , #{ membersId } , #{ membersPwd } , #{ membersTel } , SYSDATE , 'N' )
INSERT INTO AUTH_ROLE ( Members_No , AUTH_NUM ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBERS_NO.CURRVAL , 2 )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERS_ID FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBERS_ENTIRE = 'N' AND MEMBERS_NO = #{ membersNo }
SELECT ORDERS_NO , MEMBERS_BUYER , ORDERS_PRICE , ORDERS_DATE , ORDERS_DIV , SELLINGORDER_NO , MEMBERS_SELLER , ORDERS_STATUS , BUYING_ORDER_CODE FROM ORDERS WHERE MEMBERS_BUYER = #{ membersBuyer }
SELECT ORDERS_NO , MEMBERS_BUYER , ORDERS_PRICE , ORDERS_DATE , ORDERS_DIV , SELLINGORDER_NO , MEMBERS_SELLER , ORDERS_STATUS , BUYING_ORDER_CODE FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDERS_NO = #{ ordersNo }

SELECT BUYING_ORDERS_CODE , MEMBERS_NO , PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE , BUYING_ORDER_REGISTDATE , BUYING_ORDER_PRICE , BUYING_ORDER_STATUS , BUYING_ORDER_CANCELLATION_DATE , BUYING_ORDER_SUCCESSING_DATE , BUYING_ORDER_DEADLINE_DATE FROM BUYING_ORDERS WHERE BUYING_ORDERS_CODE = #{buyingOrdersCode}

SELECT
SELLINGORDER_NO, PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE, MEMBERS_NO, SELLINGORDER_DATE, SELLINGORDER_PRICE, SELLINGORDER_STATUS, SELLINGORDER_CANCELLATION_DATE, SELLINGORDER_SUCCESSING_DATE, SELLINGORDER_DEADLINE_DATE FROM SELLING_ORDERS WHERE SELLINGORDER_NO = #{sellingOrderNo}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME_KR, P.PRODUCT_ENTRY_DATE, P.CATEGORIES_CODE, P.BRAND_NO, P.PRODUCT_COUNT, O.PRODUCT_OPTION_COLOR O.PRODUCT_OPTION_SIZE O.PRODUCT_OPTION_ETC O.PRODUCT_OPTION_QUANTITIY
FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE O ON (P.PRODUCT_CODE = O.PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE P.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME_KR, P.PRODUCT_ENTRY_DATE, P.CATEGORIES_CODE, P.BRAND_NO, P.PRODUCT_COUNT, O.PRODUCT_OPTION_COLOR O.PRODUCT_OPTION_SIZE O.PRODUCT_OPTION_ETC O.PRODUCT_OPTION_QUANTITIY
FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE O ON (P.PRODUCT_CODE = O.PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'

SELECT O.ORDERS_NO, B.MEMBERS_ID AS BUYER_ID, S.MEMBERS_ID AS SELLER_ID, P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, O.ORDERS_PRICE, O.ORDERS_DATE FROM ORDERS O LEFT JOIN MEMBERS B ON (B.MEMBERS_NO = O.MEMBERS_BUYER) LEFT JOIN MEMBERS S ON (S.MEMBERS_NO = O.MEMBERS_SELLER) LEFT JOIN BUYING_ORDERS BO ON (O.BUYING_ORDER_CODE = BO.BUYING_ORDER_CODE) LEFT JOIN SELLING_ORDERS SO ON (O.SELLINGORDER_NO = SO.SELLINGORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON (BO.PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE = PO.PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON (PO.PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE)
O.MEMBERS_SELLER != O.MEMBERS_BUYER
O.ORDERS_NO = #{ searchValue }
BUYER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
SELLER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY O.ORDERS_NO DESC
